result.execSummary:
The defendant Patricia N Kaarto was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Take medication pursuant to mental health doctors recomendations. Not to consume any alcohol. Not to enter an establishment that sells alcohol for consumption on premises. Not to consume or possess any controlled substances unless prescribed by a licensed doctor.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Patricia N Kaarto

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant, Patricia N Kaarto appeared with Attorney Samuel Louis Lawton.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State. Court calls case and appearances.  Also has 16 CM 2  and TR files. Atty Lawton offers a plea questionaire and waiver of rights form.  Court speaks to the def. re: plea questionaire and waiver of rights form. Court finds the def. freely and knowingly waives her rights. Court finds there is a factual basis. State speaks to the court. Atty Lawton speaks to the court.  Court speaks to the parties. 

15 CM 163--Dismissed on State's Motion

16 CM 2-Count 1- Def. pleas guilty. Court accepts plea and finds the def. guilty.  
1 year probation.  Conditions: Take medication persuant to mental health doctors. Not to consume any alcohol. Not to enter an establishment that sells alcohol for consumption on premises.  Not to consume or possess any controlled substances unless prescribed by a licensed doctor. 
7 days county jail. Entitled to Huber

15 TR 650-Merges and Dismissed

15 TR 651-Def. pleas guilty. Court accepts plea and finds the def. guilty. $887.50--60 DTP. AODA Assessment.  DL Revoked for 6 months.

15 TR 652-Def. pleas guilty. Court accepts plea and finds the def. guilty. $250.00

16 TR 253 & 449---Dismissed on State's Motion

90 days to set up time with Community Service. Can do community serivce in lieu of paying fines.
